tetanus.description: Obtained after contact with iron tools, effect is Weakness I 5min, Slowness I 5min. After countdown ends, player will die immediately. Can be cured with Metronidazole or Anti-drug Resistant Microbial Capsules
tetanus.acute_phase: Your tetanus infection has entered acute phase,
plague.description: Obtained after contact with infected sources, effect is Weakness II 7min, Nausea I 7min. After countdown ends, player will die immediately. Can be cured with Streptomycin or Anti-drug Resistant Microbial Capsules
plague.not.cured.by.streptomycin: Streptomycin failed to cure your plague, try again
plague.cured.by.capsules: Anti-drug resistant microbial capsules have cured your plague
candidiasis.description: May be acquired when exhausted or infected with plague or tetanus. Causes Weakness I and Slowness I for 3 minutes, followed by an acute phase with Nausea for 20 seconds, after which it is fatal
candidiasis.acute_phase: Your Candida infection has entered acute phase!
candidiasis.infected: You have been infected with Candida auris!
candidiasis.symptoms: You feel weak and move slower
metronidazole.description: Used for tetanus treatment, kills tetanus bacteria
metronidazole.treatment.failed: Treatment failed! Tetanus bacteria has developed resistance to metronidazole
metronidazole.treatment.success: Treatment successful! Tetanus infection has been cleared
streptomycin.description: Used for plague treatment, kills Yersinia pestis bacteria
streptomycin.treatment.failed: Treatment failed! Plague bacteria has developed resistance to streptomycin
streptomycin.treatment.success: Treatment successful! Plague infection has been cleared
antifungal_drug.description: Used for candidiasis treatment, kills Candida auris fungi
antifungal_drug.treatment.failed: Treatment failed! Candida has developed resistance to antifungal drug
antifungal_drug.treatment.success: Treatment successful! Candida infection has been cleared
commands.bioresistance.tetanus_resistanc: Set tetanus bacteria resistance to metronidazole (value between 0-1)
Failed to set tetanus bacteria resistance
commands.bioresistance.plague_resistance: Set plague bacteria resistance to streptomycin (value between 0-1)
Failed to set plague bacteria resistance
commands.bioresistance.candida_resistanc: Set Candida auris resistance to antifungal drug (value between 0-1)
Failed to set Candida auris resistance
anti_drug_resistant_microbial_ointment.t: Treatment successful! Candida infection has been cleared
